pages.text: This tree has an olive-textured wood block set and can be found in the $(l:hexalia:biomes/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$().

This tree has an soft brown wood block set and can be found in the $(l:hexalia:biomes/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$().$(br2)Resin can be obtained from its logs by using a $(l:hexalia:tools/stone_dagger)Stone Dagger$()
